comments:
I got an index out of bounds error when trying to cut a block of text using 
CTRL+X. I didn't record the exact verbage, but something to the effect of 'the 
key combination is invalid; index out of range/bounds'

Sorry if it seemed like I was indicating this happened all the time --

I have cut and pasted lots of text using keyboard shortcuts and it worked 
fine -- this was an isolated incident that I could not readily repeat.
You could still provide most of the information listed in comment 1's link.

On behalf of Nicholas Vidovich (sent to me by e-mail):

I?ve been trying to update the bug report with that information since this
morning but the page won?t load ? every time I try to add I get a page not found
error from http://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/process_bug.cgi
 
Here are the details of what I am trying to post:
 
Build ID: 200409240800
Compiler Compliance: 1.5
Using JRE 1.5.0
